DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether medical treatment bladder outlet obstruction effective improvement glomerular filtration rate and/or proteinuria .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Daily Tamsulosin 0.2mg Administration Renal Function Patients With Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia
DOC.detailed_description: Urodynamic parameter include maximal flow rate , compliance ( infused volume gradient divide bladder pressure gradient cystometry ) , maximal detrusor pressure , bladder outlet obstruction index Schäfer grade check . Estimated glomerular filtration rate urinary protein creatinine ratio check . International prostate symptom score check .
DOC.criteria: Men low urinary tract symptom age 40 80 Estimated glomerular filtration rate < 60 evidence proteinuria Bladder outlet obstruction index > 40 , Schäfer grade 2 , maximal flow rate lower 10 cc/s postvoid residual urine > 100cc Bladder outlet obstruction index less 40 , Schäfer grade 0 1 , maximal flow rate high 10 ml/s postvoid residual urine le 100cc Want surgical procedure Evidence prostate cancer bladder cancer Major depressive disorder , Dementia , Parkinson 's disease neurological deficit History pelvic irradiation Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus hypertension Symptomatic orthostatic hypotension
